movie.title: Hello I Must Be Going
movie.description_intro: Following the break-up with and imminent divorce from her entertainment lawyer husband David, thirty-something Amy moves back in with her upper middle class parents Ruth and Stan Minsky in Westport, Connecticut. David asked for the divorce following an affair he had with who Amy considered a friend. Knowledge of the affair and David asking for the divorce came out of left field for Amy, who thought she had the perfect marriage. In her surprise and shock about David, she left David basically with the clothes on her back, and has not asked for anything in the divorce settlement. Three months later, she is still in a depressed state, not leaving the house and not knowing what to do with her life. She has no real job experience, has only a liberal arts degree, and abandoned her Master's degree studies in Photography to marry David. She believes her parents have mixed feelings about her return. Although they have both welcomed her back, she believes Ruth is critical not so much about what ...

movies.title: One Missed Call
movies.summary: People mysteriously start receiving voicemail messages from their future selves, in the form of the sound of them reacting to their own violent deaths, along with the exact date and time of their future death, listed on the message log. The plot thickens as the surviving characters pursue the answers to this mystery which could save their lives.

The plot thickens as the surviving characters pursue the answers to this mystery which could save their lives.

movies.title: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
movies.title_english: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
movies.title_long: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion (1997)
movies.summary: Romy and Michele have been through it all, including being tortured by the Popular crowd when in high school. When they receive word of a 10 year reunion, they come to realize their lives aren't as impressive as they'd like them to be. Instead of staying home they go to the reunion with business outfits, cell phones, and one heck of a bogus success story.

movies.title: Welcome to Curiosity
movies.summary: Four interconnected stories surrounding the escape from prison of a notorious serial killer.
movies.description_full: Four interconnected stories surrounding the escape from prison of a notorious serial killer.
movies.synopsis: Four interconnected stories surrounding the escape from prison of a notorious serial killer.

movies.title: Days of Power
movies.summary: On their 2010 tour, an International Pop Star and band mates mysteriously disappear. As past and present merge, they find themselves searching for answers and fighting for more than just their own lives when a concealed industry is revealed.
movies.description_full: On their 2010 tour, an International Pop Star and band mates mysteriously disappear. As past and present merge, they find themselves searching for answers and fighting for more than just their own lives when a concealed industry is revealed.
